phrases: I do not want you to hate me.
There you go, saying things like that.
But, I am a little grateful to you.
Will I forget this sort of feeling, too?
I have not properly said thank you yet.
I will come save you as many times as needed.
I will make you fall for me as many times as needed.
Leave it all to your Master.
You should step down from the position of the Prez's knight now.
If she seriously starts to hate you, this will not be fun for you at all.
Do you really want me to get serious?
I-It is no use threatening me now.
It made me irritated, and I could not fall asleep.
You have gone too far for me to care that you are not good with girls.
I will put you through the ultimate punishment.
Where the campus opens for the seniors in junior high.
It happens on the weekend, and showing off the clubs is the main point, so it is got nothing to do with us.
No, I heard they will do more than just showing off the clubs.
It looks like you will be doing various things this year.
I want to make a cute cafeteria in the middle of the tour course as a rest area.
And I want to make it an environment where even the middle school students can blend in.
I know the preparation for it will be hard work, but could you guys help out?
We will ask other girls, too.
I cannot wait to see the junior high students come.
We need to consider the budget, too.
And, I am sure you will need someone to do the heavy work, and cannot expect much help from the guys,
He is Kanou Soutarou-kun, a freshman.
Due to a certain reason, he is the student council's assistant.
You always have a hood on, do not you?
Okay, so let us go gather people up.
How about we make a hot pot?
I do not really understand the situation,
but if you help out as part of the cafeteria staff, Prez says she will forgive you.
Oh, by the way, I am Yukimura, the vice president.
Kanou-kun, can you help carry these boxes?
Prez, if we do that, we will have a problem here.
Then let us move that to the chemistry lab.
She should not be in the cafeteria now.
There is only one of her.
I have noticed something strange while looking at Kanou.
He is avoiding the girls, but he does not see them as enemies.
It does not look like he is allergic to girls.
You think we can do something about that wall?
We come to the store regardless of whether Misa-chan is here or not.
That is what true love is.
I guess Usui is here, too.
Sis, it is the curcuma tea and chestnut jelly I won in the mail as a prize.
Are you preparing for the open house?
What sort of high school would you want to attend?
Nothing like,'a school with mail in prize club'.
Has a mail in present club.
In other words, that is all you care about.
Kanou-kun, a little to the right.
Looks like you are hard at work, Kanou.
Would you take a look at this?
We would like to use this as the costume.
We went through a lot getting them.
The teachers said it looks interesting, too.
You do not think it is a good idea?
The students will take you on the tour.
People who want to actively participate in clubs, come over here!
For the liberal arts club, come here!
If you are into art, come here.
I am sure different people want to see different sides of Seika High, so please pick the course you are interested in.
What is The Seven Mysteries Course?
Which one should I go on?
If you cannot choose a course or would like to get a broad image of the school, come here.
Can I get an extra hand here?!
Then you set the course plan.
Obviously, Misa-chan's not here today, either.
I do not think we had to come today, too...
How many times do I have to say it?!
True love is coming to the shop whether Misa-chan is here or not!
Oh, what is the matter, Masters?
We feel as if we are getting treated like extras recently.
Well, not like it bothers us...
But we will wait on you with Maid Latte's full staff.
I am rising up to the heavens.
I can feel myself rising up.
And as a special service, allow me to introduce the kitchen staff.
It is our first time actually coming out, so we are not sure what to say.
Please do not worry about it.
I am glad it was not a mysterious creature that was cooking in the back.
Then I will fill the customer's feedback with this excitement that I am feeling.
Okay, then I will harness my excitement to write one poem after another!
Then I will recall the times I have shared with Misa-chan!
I wrote Annoying on it, sir.
You are bothering the other Masters, so could you keep it down?
You do not have to ever come back, Masters.
It will be great if we can hear kind words from her one day.
The second of Seika High School's seven mysteries is sound coming out of the PA, despite the empty broadcasting room.
Looks like everything is progressing well right now.
You can be the sand bag!
Let us tackle each other in order to get to know everyone.
They are making fools out of themselves.
Do not be such a stranger.
If you are going to act bored, you should remember that you did not have to come to school on a weekend.
Come on, I am helping out as your support.
Is not it reassuring to have me around?
Everyone gets distracted when you are around.
Then what am I supposed to do?
I have a task that I would love for you to do.
They are not trying to be friends with the ball.
You failure of a soccer team!
Usui said he wants to become friends with the ball!
Let us put a uniform on, too!
You will get a chance to see something amazing!
Usui-san's helping out with gathering a crowd?
Then we have to get him, too!
Therefore, please help out the sports teams for Seika's sake.
We actually have a uniform prepared for you.
You can have fun by yourselves!
Do not say things like that.
Let us enjoy it to the end.
Although you often ran away in the beginning.
We will work with the customers, so you can just carry the dishes.
We will support you when something happens.
We have one that is perfect for you.
Let us be friends with the ball!
Please come work with the baseball team next!
Anywhere else you would like to see?
We got to see the art equipment in the art room, and even got to play a guitar for the first time in the music room!
I did not think the visit could be this fun!
Be sure to enjoy it fully.
So all of the courses end at the cafeteria?
I figured everyone would be tired from walking, so I prepared a time to rest and ask questions at the end.
You can hear stories from other senpais, too.
It is just like a maid cafe.
It looks like things are going well here.
Though honestly, some are pretty dumbfounded.
But if you go talk to them, they come in.
I thought the boys would laugh, but they look pretty relaxed.
Both the boys and the girls are enjoying it.
It would be fun if every day was like this.
Do not you think it is wonderful to have such a good time with everyone?
Okay, I will go check other places out.
You look pretty cute there, Kanou.
I cannot run anywhere when I am surrounded by so many girls!
Do not tell me they stripped you down.
This is why I hate girls.
How is this perfect on me?
What is up with this cute hood?
How differently do girls see our world?
Why does it make people so cheerful?
What in the world is that creature?!
You keep eye contact more often while you talk, now.
I am sure you saw them from close up.
Were they as weak and fragile as you thought?
I do not think you need to run away anymore.
This is the first time I have ever spent so much time with girls.
Do not underestimate the high schoolers.
Maybe I will apply to Seika.
You mean you want to join us?
I am not good with boys.
She is been in an environment with nothing but girls all the time.
She only came here with us.
There are a lot of boys at Seika, right?
I wish it was an all girls' school.
What do you mean Mom's broken and left us?
Women are more weak and fragile than you imagine!
You would better be careful with how you handle them, too!
If they are going to break, then I will not go near them anymore.
Mom only got fed up with Dad and left.
I have known that a long time.
I am taking the dishes in now.
I have known it a long time, but I never got the urge to get close to them.
If I became close to someone, something like that could happen again.
Were they really as weak or fragile as you thought?
Make her feel like you are not scary.
Take a good look at her.
I do not think you need to run away anymore.
I will cast a spell on you now.
No longer be afraid of boys!
I do not think I am afraid of them anymore.
So you can use a cute spell like that, too, glasses bunny?
You can call it done when you finish carrying that.
Thank you for your hard work.
As promised, I will forgive you for everything.
Be careful on your way home.
Why are not you saying anything?
Then can you thank me now?
You did not come check on me at all.
Thanks to you, it looks like the sports teams had a wonderful open house!
Can you do something that would make you happy if it were done to you?
I seriously look up to you the most of all.
Nobody noticed that you are a guy.
It is not like that, Kanou-kun!
I want to change, but I cannot find my uniform!
We can stay awake surprisingly long if we are constantly doing something.
Maybe Kanou-kun should have cast some other sort of hypnosis.
She could go sleepless for a month.
Hey, do not take it seriously, Kanou.
To change the topic here, next week will be a summer episode.
The Maid Latte members will be going to the beach house!
Usui-kun, thanks for volunteering as bodyguard.
